product_name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Kitchen Sink - 10 liter
long_description: Weighing only 1.7 oz, the 10-liter Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil kitchen sink can be carried into backcountry campsites to make cleaning up after dinner quick and easy. Not just for washing dishes-use the Ultra-Sil kitchen sink to collect and purify water, for personal bathing or as a water bowl for your pet. Super lightweight 30-denier siliconized Cordura(R) nylon fabric stands up to regular use around the campsite; fabric is seam sealed and leakproof. Includes 2 lightweight and strong Hypalon(R) carry handles for moving the sink around while it's full of water. Delrin(R)-reinforced rim provides stability to keep the sink from collapsing or tipping over when full. The Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil kitchen sink includes a small stuff sack for convenient packing. Practice the Leave No Trace principles of outdoor ethics by not washing directly into rivers and lakes. Avoid polluting streams and endangering aquatic life by washing dishes and bathing 200 ft. away from streams and lakes.
short_description: Weighing only 1.7 oz, the 10-liter Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil kitchen sink can be carried into backcountry campsites to make cleaning up after dinner quick and easy.
